modShortDescription: Would you like to throw down some torches to add some light? This 7 Days to Die mod adds a new torch system to the A17 and A18 game versions.
modDescription:
Tired of ever-lasting torches? Would you like to throw down some torches to add some [light](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-lights/)? This mod will do both!

This 7 Days to Die mod adds a new torch system to the A17 and A18 game versions.

**Adds 3 New Recipes:**

* Hand Torch that can be used as a [weapon](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-weapons/), held for light, and thrown to illuminate that dark pit, bottom of a staircase, or the base of your fortification.
* Fast Burning Torch Block that is mountable, simply take a tin can and a Hand Torch to create, this is a quick and cheap way to light up the area for about 1 minute.
* Slow Burning Torch Block, adding oil to the [recipe](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-recipes/), you’ll be able to get about 10 minutes of burn time.

In order to enjoy the full experience of this mod, you will need to remove references to the exploited, “ever lasting” vanilla torches for the full effect of this mod from entityclasses and recipes.

**Note:** Guppycur is aware of some potential exploits with this torch, but to keep it a simple XML modlet, he had to sacrifice customization.

[Download](https://gitlab.com/guppycur/guppymods/-/archive/master/guppymods-master.zip?path=Guppycur%27s_New_Torch_System)

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/9144-guppycurs-modlets/).

**Credits:** [Guppycur](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/guppycur/)
